name: Omelette du destiny BETA
description:
[FOR TESTING]

Your hard studies at Eggoven's witch Academy have almost paid off. You are to join the Eggoven ass soon as you get your degree. Deciding to write your degree paper on all the chicken types might have not been the most inspired idea, but you're sure you'll manage. As a new witch, the Eggoven provided you with your own little farm to start collecting and carring for the chicken. 

Talk with other village people and find ways to opptain as many different chickens as possible to study them.  As long as you have your magic omelletes, nothing can stop you!

Will you manage to collect them all? 

[DEV DETAILS] 

This game is currently in development so there are a LOT of stuff not implemented yet.
